snippet: The settlement, reached Friday, would resolve virtually all repurchase liabilities on home loans sold to Freddie Mac before 2009.
abstract: Wells Fargo says it will pay $780 million in cash to Freddie Mac to resolve virtually all repurchase liabilities on home loans sold to Freddie before 2009.
lead_paragraph: The settlement, reached Friday, would resolve virtually all repurchase liabilities on home loans sold to Freddie Mac before 2009.

headline.main: Freddie Mac and Wells Fargo Settle on Loans
headline.print_headline: Freddie Mac And Wells Fargo Settle on Loans

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
